name: Wavetables
description: A visual wavetable synthesizer where X=phase, Y=morph, color=amplitude. 20 oscillators (Sine to Shepard), 55 palettes with hue rotation, full GPU DSP chain (wave folding, bitcrush, ring mod, comb filter, slew), 10 post-FX textures, 5 animation modes. Interactive: S=save PNG, V=toggle 2D/isometric 3D view, P/Space=pause, +/-=speed. In isometric mode: click+drag to rotate, scroll to zoom.
